content:
I've got all that noted down for you!

Here's your summer concert schedule so far:

**Upcoming Shows:**

* July 17th: Jonas Brothers at TD Garden
* August 20th: The Lumineers at House of Blues

**Potential Show:**

* Music festival in Rhode Island (TBD - need to check ticket availability)

**Past Show:**

* June 15th: Imagine Dragons at Xfinity Center (you've already attended this one!)

Let me know if you end up getting tickets to the music festival or if you add any other shows to your schedule. I'll be happy to update your list!

Also, how was the Imagine Dragons concert? Which songs were your favorite from the setlist?
